info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 5:27PM EDT until May 13 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of western Maryland, including the following county, Garrett.
* WHEN...Until 1130 PM EDT Tuesday.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 524 PM EDT, Between 2.5 and 5 inches of rain have fallen and Emergency Management has reported several instances of flooding across eastern Garrett County. Additional rainfall is expected through this evening, and this may exacerbate the situation. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Grantsville... New Germany... Merrill... Jennings... Big Run State Park... Piney Grove... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING
